title: Should I wait for the Redmi Note 9 Pro or buy a Redmi Note 8 Pro? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on your phone you are currently using. If you have a phone that is working fine you should stick with it and wait for redmi note 9 pro. However, if you need a phone right now go for redmi note 8 pro. Simple isn't it ?

Get Redmi Note 8 Pro, currently there's no processor that can beat Helio G90T in Midrange segment in terms of gaming and raw Performance. Even Snapdragon 730G has no match to Helio G90T. King Qualcomm leaved Midrange segment and they are focusing on 5G and AI.
